content:
The provided code snippet is part of a larger Protobuf file that defines various configuration options for an Android application. Specifically, the chunk in question defines an enum `WideColorGamut` within the `Configuration` message type, which specifies settings related to device color gamut support. This enum includes values for when wide color gamut is unset, supported (WIDE_IColor_Gamut_WIDECG), or not supported (WIDEIColor_Gamut_NOWIDECG). The overall document establishes a comprehensive set of configuration parameters used by the Android framework tools to manage application resources and device compatibility.

_CONFIGURATION_WIDECOLORGAMUT = _descriptor.EnumDescriptor(

  filename=None,
  file=DESCRIPTOR,

  values=[

      serialized_options=None,
      type=None,
      create_key=_descriptor._internal_create_key),
    _descriptor.EnumValueDescriptor(
      name='WIDE_COLOR_GAMUT_WIDECG', index=1, number=1,
      serialized_options=None,
      type=None,
      create_key=_descriptor._internal_create_key),
    _descriptor.EnumValueDescriptor(
      name='WIDE_COLOR_GAMUT_NOWIDECG', index=2, number=2,
      serialized_options=None,
      type=None,
      create_key=_descriptor._internal_create_key),
  ],
  containing_type=None,

_sym_db.RegisterEnumDescriptor(_CONFIGURATION_WIDECOLORGAMUT)
